items.sentence: Tom loved to sing, but nobody wanted to listen to his singing.
Tom should have known better than to call Mary after midnight.
Tom sometimes is very aggressive and likes to start arguments.
Tom soon realized that no one was paying any attention to him.
Learning to speak a foreign language well takes a lot of time.
Tom and Mary blamed themselves for everything that went wrong.
Tom has been trying to find a new apartment for quite a while.
I think you need to spend a little more time on your homework.
Tom asked Mary some questions, but she refused to answer them.
Tom always yells at Mary every time she does something stupid.
